name: F.E.A.R. Extraction Point
description:
F.E.A.R. Extraction Point is an action-shooter game developed by TimeGate Studios. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Sierra Entertainment. F.E.A.R. Extraction Point has a Metascore of 75, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play F.E.A.R. Extraction Point on PC.
